html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-06652021-07-01,  ,  ,  ,  HC,  PHAC
ActQuarantine Act
SubjectMinimizing the Risk of Exposure to COVID-19 in Canada Order (Quarantine, Isolation and Other Obligations)
PrecisOrder amending the MINIMIZING THE RISK OF EXPOSURE TO COVID-19 IN CANADA ORDER (QUARANTINE, ISOLATION AND OTHER OBLIGATIONS) (P.C. 2021-615 of June 21, 2021) in order to change the coming into force time for provisions relating to fully vaccinated travellers from 11:59:59 p.m. to 12:01 a.m. Eastern Daylight Time on July 5, 2021.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Minimizing the Risk of Exposure to COVID-19 in Canada Order (Quarantine, Isolation and Other Obligations)
precis: Order amending the MINIMIZING THE RISK OF EXPOSURE TO COVID-19 IN CANADA ORDER (QUARANTINE, ISOLATION AND OTHER OBLIGATIONS) (P.C. 2021-615 of June 21, 2021) in order to change the coming into force time for provisions relating to fully vaccinated travellers from 11:59:59 p.m. to 12:01 a.m. Eastern Daylight Time on July 5, 2021.
